text.section:
Sec. 33K-1. Short title and applicability.
This chapter [Ordinance No. 95-79] shall be known and may be cited as the "Educational Facilities Impact Fee Ordinance."
The Board of County Commissioners of Metropolitan Miami-Dade County have the authority to adopt this Ordinance pursuant to Article VIII, Section 6 of the Florida Constitution (1968), Section 1.01, Miami-Dade County Charter, Chapter 163, Part II, Florida Statutes, and Sections 235.19 and 235.193, Florida Statutes.
This chapter shall be applicable to all land development within the entire area of Miami-Dade County.
This chapter is intended to implement and be consistent with the CDMP.
